title: ali maitO
sahitya:
ali maitO jamunA jal bharaNan gayi jab shyAm sundar sU bhEnT bhayI


caraNam 1    mOran kE pinch sIs virAjat bAnsuri mO upajat tAn nayI
    caraNam 2    gauvan ke sang kSaN dhAvE kSaN ThADe gvAl bAl sE bOli bOlE amrtamayI
    caraNam 3    sOyi padmanAbh prabhu phaNiparashAyi mOhE nihAl karE trilOkdAyi
